title: SaaS Optimizer Dashboard
summary: Analytics platform helping SaaS companies optimize conversion funnels with real-time insights.
problem: Legacy analytics dashboard with slow load times and complex UX preventing product teams from making data-driven decisions quickly.
solution: Built a modern React dashboard with real-time WebSocket updates, intelligent caching, and intuitive drill-down navigation.
impact: 64% increase in conversion tracking adoption, 1.2s average load time, and 42% improvement in daily active users.

title: Headless E-Commerce Platform
summary: High-performance e-commerce built with headless WordPress and Next.js for blazing-fast shopping.
problem: Slow traditional WordPress site with 4s+ load times causing high cart abandonment and poor mobile experience.
solution: Migrated to headless architecture with WooCommerce backend and Next.js frontend, implementing ISR and image optimization.
impact: 1.3s LCP, 38% revenue increase, 22% reduction in cart abandonment, and 95+ Lighthouse scores.

title: AI Customer Support Assistant
summary: Intelligent chatbot powered by GPT-4 reducing support ticket volume by 28% with RAG architecture.
problem: Customer support team overwhelmed with repetitive questions, leading to slow response times and scaling challenges.
solution: Built RAG-powered chatbot with company knowledge base, seamless handoff to human agents, and continuous learning.
impact: 28% reduction in ticket volume, sub-2-second response times, and 4.7/5 customer satisfaction rating.

title: Banking Analytics Dashboard
summary: Real-time financial analytics platform for corporate banking with advanced reporting and compliance.
problem: Manual financial reporting taking hours, error-prone data aggregation, and compliance audit challenges.
solution: Automated reporting pipeline with Plaid integration, real-time data validation, and audit trail generation.
impact: 99.9% data accuracy, 3-second report generation, and 100% compliance audit pass rate.

title: Fitness Tracking Mobile App
summary: Cross-platform fitness app with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and social features.
problem: Existing fitness apps too complex or lacking social features, resulting in poor user retention.
solution: Built intuitive React Native app with gamification, friend challenges, and seamless HealthKit integration.
impact: 50K+ daily active users, 68% 30-day retention, and 4.8/5 App Store rating.

title: Local Business SEO Platform
summary: SEO optimization platform helping local businesses rank higher with automated schema markup and content analysis.
problem: Local businesses struggling with Google visibility, missing structured data, and poor mobile performance.
solution: Automated schema markup generation, mobile-first site redesign, and local SEO optimization strategy.
impact: 156% increase in organic traffic, Top 3 local rankings for key terms, and 89% more conversions.

title: Real Estate Listing Portal
summary: Modern property search platform with interactive maps, virtual tours, and AI-powered recommendations.
problem: Outdated property search with slow filters, poor mobile UX, and no map-based discovery.
solution: Built fast property search with Mapbox integration, instant filters, and AI-powered recommendations.
impact: 10K+ active listings, 0.8s search response, and 72% increase in property inquiries.

title: Enterprise Data Pipeline
summary: Automated ETL pipeline processing millions of records daily with real-time monitoring and alerts.
problem: Manual data processing causing delays, errors, and requiring significant engineering resources.
solution: Automated ETL pipeline with Airflow orchestration, error handling, and real-time monitoring dashboards.
impact: 5M+ records processed daily, 99.8% uptime, and 45% reduction in operational costs.

title: Patient Portal Platform
summary: HIPAA-compliant patient portal with appointment scheduling, telemedicine, and secure messaging.
problem: Phone-based scheduling causing high no-show rates, poor patient communication, and administrative burden.
solution: Built HIPAA-compliant portal with online scheduling, SMS reminders, and secure video consultations.
impact: 2K+ monthly appointments, 34% reduction in no-shows, and 4.6/5 patient satisfaction.

title: ML Recommendation Engine
summary: Machine learning recommendation system improving product discovery and increasing average order value.
problem: Generic product recommendations resulting in low engagement and missed cross-sell opportunities.
solution: Trained collaborative filtering model with real-time inference, A/B testing, and continuous learning.
impact: 48% higher click-through rate, 31% increase in AOV, and sub-100ms recommendation latency.

title: Enterprise WordPress Multisite
summary: Scalable WordPress multisite network serving 50+ brands with centralized management and SSO.
problem: Managing 50+ separate WordPress instances causing security risks, update delays, and admin overhead.
solution: Consolidated to multisite network with SSO, automated updates, centralized asset management, and Redis caching.
impact: 50+ sites managed centrally, 99.9% uptime, and 60% reduction in administrative time.

title: Food Delivery Mobile App
summary: Fast and reliable food delivery app with real-time tracking and seamless payment integration.
problem: Existing delivery app with poor tracking, slow checkout, and unreliable driver assignment.
solution: Built fast React Native app with real-time GPS tracking, one-tap checkout, and intelligent driver routing.
impact: 3K+ daily orders, 28-minute average delivery time, and 4.7/5 customer rating.
